aors.module.visopengl.space.component
Interface SpaceComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cell, Margin, Track
public interface SpaceComponent

Each space component (Track, Cell, Margin) has to implement this interface.

Since:
March 17th, 2010

Method Summary
 void display(GL2 gl, GLU glu)
          Displays the space component.

          Returns the height of an object in world coordinate system.
 double getObjectWidth(double width)
          Returns the width of an object in world coordinate system.
 double getRotation(double x, double y)
          Returns the rotation of an object related to the space model.
 double[] getWorldCoordinates(double x, double y)
          Returns an objects coordinates in world coordinate system.
